author: Yessi Bello Perez
title: How travel tech companies aim to survive the coronavirus pandemic
description: The coronavirus pandemic has so far had devastating consequences across the travel industry. Airlines have flown empty planes to try and keep their usual slots despite flight prices dropping below unimaginable levels — tickets from New York to Miami were on o…
content:
